data.text:
Friends recommended this hotel to me (family, mum, dad and 9 year old) and I was a touch apprehensive as a three day stay was only a touch over GBP20 per day.
However, our room was made available at 13.00 and I was most pleased with the standard of the room and bathroom.  The bed was comfortable, the room size sufficient, with a small balcony,  and the bathroom fitted to a fairly high standard.
The breakfast, at first look, wasn't too impressive because, as a Brit (albeit I haven't lived there for forty years) I still yearn for a greasy Joe's, but when I realized I was the only non-Russian in the hotel, I jelled in to the cold meats, cheese, pate and salads (with olives and gerkins to kill for) and thoroughly enjoyed my four assorted breakfast plates.
The swimming pool, though small, is on the top floor and immaculately clean.
The hotel is 100m from the beach.
The cellar provides safe storage if you're on a motorbike (as we were).
The reception are helpful.
The room service seemed fast and efficient.
In all, no cons here.
Would I come back?
If i wanted an inexpensive hotel, a definite yes.
data.title: A SATISFIED FAMILY....

data.text:
The hotel was clean and situated centrally. Food was steps away and the beach was steps away. 
The one issue with the hotel was the Breakfast food. I don't expect much from any buffet, no matter where I go, but this was horrible. Nothing seemed fresh. Pancakes/waffles must of been out too long - they were rubbery. The bacon looked like it died a few times before cooked - or on another day, it wasn't cooked enough. The food they had was very catered to Russian delicacies as the main tourists in Nha Trang are Russians - if you are looking for a Western Breakfast, this is not where you will find it. 
The cleaners also seemed to clean our room late. We were on the 9th floor. Sometimes we would come back to the room at 2pm and it would still not be clean. Not sure if that was due to shortage of staff or just how the hotel does things, regardless, it was a but of a nuisance.
data.title: February 2020 Vietnam Trip

data.text: Nice and clean hotel, very supportive staff. Choices of food just steps away. We were upgraded to a high floor room and the view was fantastic. Small swimming pool on the roof.Long sandy beach nearby.Highly recommended.
data.title: Great hotel in very convenient place

data.text:
I stayed here for 3 night with my boyfriend as it was his 30th birthday present.
I asked the staff for a cake to make his stay more special and they were really helpful and organised it for me and also they asked if I wanted special messege on the cake which I thought was lovely.
Once we arrived they had the cake in the room set up so that was just nice.

The staff are so friendly and very very helpful.

Hotel is clean and close to the beach. Great location.

I would love to come back and stay here again. The room was so pretty and very comfy beds. There was day I didn't want to leave the hotel as it was just too nice.

I would recommend it to everyone. Really love place to stay.

The weather was amazing 30 degrees in December. So guys if you are looking to be in hot city for December this is the place to go. Amazing.
data.title: Amazing place to stay
data.partner_attribution: Review collected in partnership with this hotel

data.text: Everything was beautiful. We didn‚Äôt know what a 10 was until we found this one. Amazing people and breakfast was to amazing, love all the fresh meal. We spent only two days and will definitely miss it. The reception was brilliant.
data.title: exceptional

data.text: Loved our stay in this hotel. We were upgraded to ocean view room which had a terrific view. The location was perfect with many nearby restaurants and shops and in the main tourist section. The rooftop pool area has a bar and stunning views over Nha Trang. Would definitely stay again.
data.title: Great location for stay

data.text:
Cheap complete breakfast at less than 3 USD. I loved the tomatoes and omellete.
Good coffee
Rooftop pool
Beach view

One of the best breakfast experience I had!
I will come back for sure 

Centrally located too...
Few minutes to the beach

data.title: Best affordable breakfast in rooftop pool

data.text:
Positive points:
1. The hotel is just two blocks away from the beach.
2. Buffet breakfast and massage were okay.
3. It's a non-smoking hotel.
4. There are a lot of restaurants around. 

Things to be aware of:
1. From the pictures of the hotel the rooftop pool looked really nice but it turned out to be rather small. 
2. Wifi was kinda unstable.
3. The walkie-talkie of the cleaning staff was quite loud - we could hear them talking to one another in our room.
4. Our room was not as clean as we expected - the ventilation vent in the bathroom was dusty and the floor under the bed was also a bit dusty.
data.title: Convenient location but not very clean

owner_response.text:
Dear fkleetoto, 

Warmest greetings from LegendSea Hotel.

We happy about your positive comment for our service and location. We are lucky to be in the heart of the city hence it is very convenient for guests to go for shopping, restaurants, bars‚Ä¶ We are only 2 minutes by walk away from the beach.

Regarding the Wi-Fi, during your stay, all three submarine optical cable lines connecting to Vietnam had problems affecting Vietnam's internet speed. The internet operator confirmed that it would take about one month to fix it. We ask for your understanding as it is beyond our control.

Regarding the cleaning and the walkie-talkie of the cleaning staff, we are sorry for the inconvenience.Your remarks will be passed on to the housekeeping department.
We strongly ask each and every respective department to implement and improve our services day by day. It is our main purpose as a top 4-star hotel in Nha Trang. 
It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the Legendsea Hotel Nha Trang for your next visit to Viet Nam.

Thanks again and we hope to see you in another occasion.

Best regards,
Hoang D.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.partner_attribution: Review collected in partnership with this hotel

data.text:
Pretty nice view -  slice of ocean visible 
We had the club luxury ocean view room.
Bed was nice and comfy, staff were helpful. More than happy to book us ticketa to Vinpearl land.
Hotel location was good - close to shops, restaurants, bars ,beach and a million different massage places, so everything we needed was within waking distance.
Breakfast buffet was pretty good .

Downside
Bathroom had worst design ever!
 Was impossible to take a shower without flooding the entire bathroom. Even with an overkill of shower curtains. 

Housekeeping came very late in the day so after a day out exploring and returning to hotel around 4:30pm for a rest got Interrupted each day while trying to rest up. 
Tried asking for housekeeping earlier , as we left hotel at 8am but to no avail.  Not a huge deal but no one likes been woken from a nap üòñ
data.title: Pretty good of view and location

owner_response.text:
Dear Hungasaur, 

Warmest greetings from LegendSea Hotel.

We thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We can see that you appreciated our location, our buffet breakfast and our staff friendliness.

We take note about the bathroom design. We will endeavor to find a solution to this issue.
Regarding the cleaning service: it's available from 8am to 4pm. If you want your room to be cleaned within a certain time please contact Front office staff, we will get your request done .We were reported that you didn't inform us about your issue. If only you had raised this issue during your stay so that we could fix it to make your stay better. 
One again, thank you for taking your time to post your review. We value your feedback, as it helps us to focus on what is important to our guests.
We hope to welcome you again,
Kind regards,
Hoang D. LegendSea GM
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.text:
The room was lovely - spacious, clean, good lighting, good clothes space, nice parquet floor, great bed, bathroom - except for one thing. The TV was poor - poor reception, predominantly Vietnamese channels and no English news channel apart from France 24. This hardly mattered because we did not go on holiday to watch TV, but it would have been nice to catch the news headlines on BBC or CNN or to have had a range of movie channels.
The buffet breakfast was adequate but not spectacular. I enjoyed the freshly cooked omelette and toasted brown bread along with fruit, but the range of available foods was limited. Also there was a disparity between the printed hotel deal of no free buffet breakfast and the reality - free buffet breakfast.
The reception staff were friendly and helpful, and the hotel is situated in the centre of town not far from the beach.
All in all, I would come here again.
data.title: Lovely Room ...

data.text: The Hotel location is not near to the beach, but the view is so beautiful, we are so lucky because from our room, we can enjoy the good view with sunset view. The food was delicious and fresh! The room will clean and good smell!
data.title: Wonderful View

data.text: Great hotel. Very welcoming staff, upgraded us just because they had spare rooms that were nicer than the ones we booked. Did everything they could to help us check in early as soon as the rooms were ready. Stones throw from the beach, central location, awesome rooftop pool. Decent breakfast spread, the only negative is I wanted fruit than was available at breakfast, but that‚Äôs me being picky.
data.title: Yaaaaas

data.text: Decor a bit dated, breakfast a bit tired but generally an ok hotel. The location is the best thing about the hotel, right near the beach and a few nice restaurants. Staff are very kind and helpful. Be very careful at night as was robbed by a guy on a motorbike and rickshaw driver combo act right outside the front door of hotel...
data.title: Ok hotel near the beach

data.text:
On planning a visit to Nha Trang after 50 years I chose this hotel for its familiar and convenient location and the booking deal I found on line. 
I am glad that I did. 
Location is excellent with a two minute walk to the beach, short walks to bars and restaurants. My room was perfect for a solo traveler, clean and comfortable with basic amenities such as a hair dryer and a mini-refrigerator. Housekeeping was attentive to room condition each day. Staff is/was always friendly and helpful, dining room staff the same at breakfast. One minor issue, as someone who needs to do a number of stretching exercises for my back, yoga mats in the fitness center might be a good idea. If they are there I overlooked them.
If I ever have the opportunity to return to Nha Trang I would definitely book this hotel again.
data.title: Vacation

data.text: Well located with good facilities. Given a free room upgrade and the staff were always friendly when asked for help. Their English wasn‚Äôt always the best, but they were willing to try. Rooftop pool and a decent buffet breakfast.
data.title: Decent location and facilities

data.text: Great location in the city.  Cleanliness could be improved in the rooms. Breakfast selection is pretty good but food runs out by 9.30am.  Staff are friendly and helpful. Competitive room rates, book direct with the hotel for good discounts.
data.title: Good location

data.text:
Had a lovely 2 weeks in Nah Trang region and stayed at the LegendSea Hotel for most of the stay.  It was excellent value for money.  Has a nice swimming pool area with bar, small but nice sunbathe area. Good views of the city and a small view of the beach, between 2 other hotels.  WIFI is free and was very good (we went low season so hotel and wifi bandwidth may not have been busy, we got around 20Mb/s download, all day with no issues). 

Overall a nice environment with friendly staff.  It isn't a "wow" hotel, but definitely a practical offering.  Beach is only a 2 min walk (albeit across 2 busy roads, where you have to do the usual dodging traffic - this is normal in Vietnam).  Plenty of local shops nearby and some nice restaurants.
data.title: Holiday in Nah Trang

data.text: The LegendSea is one of many big hotels close to the beach strip of Nha Trang. It's clean, modern and offers all you would expect. The hotel is surrounded by restaurants and bars. The room was clean and spacious and had a huge window front. Since it was located on the top floor ( 18th floor) we didn't get much of the noise of the busy street it's located on. The breakfast buffet offered a quite big range of international options from Asian to western.
data.title: Big Beach Hotel

data.text: We stayed for 3 night in January 2019 and booked via booking.com. When we've come,  it is really surprising for a room upgrade. We love the room in the corner with the paronama sea view and bigger than the other room. the hotel is well located near the beach and bustle road with a lot of  amenities, restaurant as well as the walking street. The breakfast is nice with popular choice of Western or Vietnamese cuisine. One thing we are disappointed was althought the breakfast start at 6 am, the fact is that they just start to set up the buffet in the restaurant and we have to wait until 6.30 am. By the way, everything is alright.
data.title: Nice location for Nha Trang trip

data.text: The Legend Sea Hotel is well located close to the beach, lots of restaurants and only a 10 minute walk to two shopping centres. Our room was great with a balcony view straight down the street to the beach and the air con cooled the room very well which made sleeping easy. The selection at breakfast was good but the pancakes would be better cooked to order, with a great view out onto the street so you could people and traffic watch while eating breakfast. The pool located on the roof of the building was a nice place to relax although a bit warm but did have great views. The hotel does need a little work on its appearance and some aspects of customer service which I have advised the hotel management of.  Would I stay at the Legend Seas Hotel again? YES.
data.title: Well located
